summary: RECALL CAMPAIGN:  IGNITION SWITCH FAILURE.   RECONNECT ALARM SYSTEM.   *BF   RECALL CAMPAIGN:  THE CONSUMER COMPLAINED THAT SHE WAS CHARGED FOR SERVICE COMPLETED UNDER THE RECALL FOR HER VEHICLE.  THE CONSUMER WAS CHARGED FOR THE SERVICE OF RECONNECTING THE ALARM SYSTEM THROUGH THE NEW WORKING PART INSTALLED.  A FULL REFUND IS REQUESTED BY THE CONSUMER.  THE RECALL ISSUE DEALT WITH THE IGNITION SWITCH INTERLOCK ON THE VEHICLE.  *TC
